scopes.account:email: Allows you to read the email addresses of user accounts.
scopes.bucket:auth_token: Allows you to read all bucket information, including Authenticated Buckets.
scopes.bucket:write: Allows you to create new buckets on behalf of the user (up to their plan limit).
scopes.message:write: Allows you to create new messages on behalf of the user (up to their plan limit).
scopes.team:read: Allows you to read team details such as lists of team members and external service integrations.
scopes.test:read: Allows you to read the details of API tests.
scopes.test:write: Allows you to create, update and delete details of API tests.
